sql-select.name: GetInstanceConfiguration
Informational checks
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSC.[name] AS [ConfigurationOptionName] ,tSC.[description] AS [ConfigurationOptionDescription] ,tSC.[value_in_use] AS [ConfigurationValueInUse] ,CASE WHEN (tSC.[name] = N'Ad Hoc Distributed Queries') THEN 0 WHEN (tSC.[name] = N'backup compression default') THEN 1 WHEN (tSC.[name] = N'clr enabled') THEN 0 WHEN (tSC.[name] = N'Database Mail XPs') THEN 0 WHEN (tSC.[name] = N'xp_cmdshell') THEN 0 WHEN (tSC.[name] = N'Ole Automation Procedures') THEN 0 WHEN (tSC.[name] = N'SMO and DMO XPs') THEN 0 WHEN (tSC.[name] = N'allow updates') THEN 0 ELSE NULL END AS [ConfigurationValueRecommended] ,CASE WHEN (tSC.[name] = N'max degree of parallelism') THEN 0 ELSE NULL END AS [ConfigurationValueNotRecommended] FROM [sys].[configurations] tSC ORDER BY tSC.[name];
